motrpacWAT 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Update Gene Ontology term descriptions

    update_GO_names.Rd

    Update entries in the gs_description column of msigdbr results to use terms from the Gene Ontology Consortium.

    update_GO_names(x, version = packageVersion("msigdbr"), capitalize = FALSE)

    Arguments

    x

    object of class data.frame produced by link[msigdbr]{msigdbr} or msigdbr2 containing columns gs_description and gs_subcat.

    version

    character string specifying the version of msigdbr to use. Defaults to the current version.

    capitalize

    logical; whether to capitalize the first letter of each description if the first word does not contain a mix of capital and lowercase letters. Improves appearance of plots, such as those produced by enrichmat.

    Value

    Object of class data.frame. The same as x, but with updated descriptions.

    Details

    This function assumes that the phrase "GO-basic obo file released on" is present in the MSigDB release notes for that version and is followed by a date.

    References

    Ashburner, M., et al. (2000). Gene ontology: tool for the unification of biology. The Gene Ontology Consortium. Nature genetics, 25(1), 25--29. https://doi.org/10.1038/75556

    Gene Ontology Consortium (2021). The Gene Ontology resource: enriching a GOld mine. Nucleic acids research, 49(D1), D325--D334. https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkaa1113

    See also

    MSigDB Release Notes Gene Ontology Data Archive

    Author

    Tyler Sagendorf

    Examples

    x <- msigdbr2(species = "Homo sapiens",
              genes = "gene_symbol",
              gs_subcat = "GO:MF")
#> Updating GO term descriptions with http://release.geneontology.org/2021-12-15/ontology/go-basic.obo
tail(x$gs_description) # before
#> [1] "Wnt-protein binding"                          
#> [2] "WW domain binding"                            
#> [3] "xenobiotic transmembrane transporter activity"
#> [4] "Y-form DNA binding"                           
#> [5] "zinc ion binding"                             
#> [6] "zinc ion transmembrane transporter activity"  

x <- update_GO_names(x)
#> Updating GO term descriptions with http://release.geneontology.org/2021-12-15/ontology/go-basic.obo
tail(x$gs_description) # after
#> [1] "Wnt-protein binding"                          
#> [2] "WW domain binding"                            
#> [3] "xenobiotic transmembrane transporter activity"
#> [4] "Y-form DNA binding"                           
#> [5] "zinc ion binding"                             
#> [6] "zinc ion transmembrane transporter activity"
